channel.title: How do i connect to my brothers computer on a LAN without him knowing?
channel.description:
How do i connect to my brothers computer on a LAN without him knowing?
give me a program or something, lol i want to see what him and his gf are saying to each other.. this one time i SAMinsided his xp login pass while he was in the shower and copied his c drive and read his saved conversations with his gf... lol how can see his comp if im on a lan?

item.title: How do i connect to my brothers computer on a LAN without him knowing?

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:17, topic:28994”][quote author=poopy4231 link=topic=42698.msg535784#msg535784 date=1164631161]
i dont want a fucking keylogger -.-
[/quote]why not, it holds with your extremely low morals[/quote]

He probably wants a lan so he can see his brother’s gf get nekked.

item.title: How do i connect to my brothers computer on a LAN without him knowing?
item.dc:creator: @N4TH4N N4TH4N
item.description:
@N4TH4N wrote:

slinkyman24:

Google Family Keylogger download it and run it on his computer hide it and get allllll his stuff lol

Or not. Seriously, follow Kyle’s advice, I don’t know why I told you to do anything but be ethical about this. It’s your brother’s private conversations and information you’re trying to get to, I don’t know about you but I really don’t like it when people look at my private stuff. Think about the decisions you’re making.
